nodes.text: Lakhti was a friend of Bant'ena Fhernan during the Clone Wars. Around 21 BBY, Fhernan was captured by the Confederacy of Independent Systems and the Separatists subsequently forced her to work for them by claiming that they would kill Fherman's friends and family, including Lakhti, if she refused to co-operate with them. The Separatists subsequently placed Lakhti under surveillance and Fhernan later showed a hologram of Lakhti to the Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker. When the Republic learned the location, Lakhti was brought to safety.
